name: Space Pizza
description:
This game was made for the Extra Credits Game Jam, but I missed the deadline for it. The game was close enough to being done that I just took an extra 24 hours and now I'm putting it out here as a real thing.

Anyways...

It's time to deliver pizza... in space. Grab your deliveries from the space restaurant and fly them to the planet that ordered them. When you visit a planet, you must navigate a procedurally generated maze to find your delivery location. Your shift is only two minutes long, so try and make it count by getting a high score!
